title: SEAFORT / BOAT
description: You're gonna need to boat yourself back somehow after everything is done.

dialogueTree.title: ROO A72 Motor Skiff: "The skiff is swaying on the waves b..."
dialogueTree.text: The skiff is swaying on the waves by the dock.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Let's. We're done here," he says,..."
links.text: "Let's. We're done here," he says, adjusting his glasses as he looks out over the water.

links.title: ROO A72 Motor Skiff: "The skiff rocks gently under your w..."
links.text: The skiff rocks gently under your weight as you get in. The ride back is uneventful and quiet.

links.title: Perception (Hearing): "But for the sound of conversation o..."
links.text: But for the sound of conversation on the water. There is someone inland, waiting for you.

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "Two men and a woman stand on the co..."
links.text: Two men and a woman stand on the concrete square of a nameless village, looking at a small yellow boat as it draws closer. The sea is calm.

links.title: ROO A72 Motor Skiff: "You reach the jetty and climb out o..."
links.text: You reach the jetty and climb out of the skiff.

links.title: Cuno: ""Oh yeah." He crosses his arms and..."
links.text: "Oh yeah." He crosses his arms and nods to you with a self-satisfied smirk. "We did good shit here, detective."

links.title: ROO A72 Motor Skiff: "You climb into the boat and start t..."
links.text: You climb into the boat and start the engine.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Are you sure? There are things we..."
links.text: "Are you sure? There are things we still need to do here..." He looks at the ruined flak tower on the cliffside.

links.title: You: ""You're right. Let's get to it." [L..."
Cuno: ""Are you sure? There's shit we need..."
links.text: "Are you sure? There's shit we need to do, sheriff..." He looks at the ruined flak tower on the cliffside.

links.title: You: ""You're right. Let's get to it." [L..."
Esprit de Corps: "Lieutenant Kitsuragi lies in the ho..."
links.text: Lieutenant Kitsuragi lies in the hospital, recovering. Barely. Are you really done here, he would ask you? Are you done with the investigation?
